item.title: Meetup - Tuesday 30th April 2019 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: It’s time for our Leeds Digital Festival event, we’re super excited to bring you two of the major names in the DevOps and Cloud Native ecosystems… 6:45 - 7:15 : Doors open, have a chat, make some new devops friends 7:15 - 7:25 : Group updates/news/announcements 7:25 - 8:05 : OpenSource security tools for Cloud Native Environments 8:05 - 8:20 : Intermission 8:20 - 9:00 : How DevOps Evolution Happens 9:00 - late : Social Our first speaker Steve Giguere is Senior Solution Architect at Aqua Security.
